website_summaries.verdict: A 12" backpack that has a front pocket which can double as a lunch box.
pros: Front pocket is insulated to help hold food or drinks
19 design choices that appeal to lots of kids
Can fit a standard sized folder
Big enough to use through kindergarten
Holds up well under daily use
cons: The top strap on this pack tends to fray with use and may come undone

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, it's sturdy and cute and a great size for a toddler. It's not large enough to fit a two pocket folder(approx size 8 1/2 ×11) without bending the corners but that's cool with me. My toddler loves the print, I also purchased the matching lunch box and nap mat. I monogrammed my toddler's backpack to distinguish it from other kids packs.
customer_reviews.author: isiskia

customer_reviews.title: so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! We purchased it for our 2.5 year old for a recent vacation we took. I let him look at all the different patterns on the Amazon listing and choose his favorite to buy. When it got here, he couldn't wait to wear his backpack! For our trip, we let him stock it with his favorite toys and snacks for the flight. It's durable, high quality material and I know it will last and he'll be able to use it in preschool too. It is designed well for a small toddler to be able to wear it all the way up to an older young child. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JasonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect preschool backpack for a little kid
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the right size for a kid bringing home homework or carrying a folder back and forth, but for our preschooler it's perfect-- not big or heavy, seems sturdy (we've only had it a couple of months), fits a kid who's a 4T just fine. For kindergarten we'll have to get something bigger but this will still be good for short outings probably.
customer_reviews.author: Rene U

customer_reviews.title: For $20+ Bucks it’s not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Backpack for my boy to use when he was going to Montessori for the first time. Used it only for like 2-3 months and the left side buckle broke. The material isn’t that bad but quality of the belts are so bad and cheap. Very disappointed. For $20 Bucks it wasn’t worth it atall. Not durable. They don’t even give a warranty. Wish I can Retun this.
customer_reviews.author: Radeepa Kiribathgala

customer_reviews.title: Grear product but doesn't fit our bento box
customer_reviews.text: Love this toddler backpack! It is sturdy and can withstand toddler tug and pull. Cute design and totally hittable! The small pocket is insulated for food, though our favorite bento box (bentgo does not fit unfortunately! So bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Neesters Yamin Murray

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in order to transition from carrying a bulky diaper bag. This book bag is perfect for our toddler. We can keep pull ups, wipes, a spare outfit, and a couple of books in the large compartment. The small compartment is perfect for a couple of snacks and small toys (cars, coloring pad and crayons). It feels like a durable item and has held up well over the last month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack3

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack but disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This overall is a very nice backpack. But. i am thoroughly disappointed after only two weeksof using it, the reinforcement (I think metal wire) is bent and about to poke through. This seems like it was a seam in the wire, where the two pieces joined together and it didnt hold up to normal wear. Sadly, within a few weeks the wire will be coming through as the fabric is getting threadbare there
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Great little bookbag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookbag. I bought this for my 2 year old and its the perfect size. He has to carry an epi pen and medicine with him at all times and this is perfect. Its got a lot of storage for its size. I'm able to fit 2-3 diapers, a package of wipes and his medicine bag in the main compartment, along with my wallet and the second smaller compartment is great for snacks and other stuff. Great size for him to carry if he wants but also for us to carry for him!
customer_reviews.author: Shay B

customer_reviews.title: Good LITTLE pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy cute little backpack. My son loved it, and it fit him well for preschool. The front pouch is a good size for small things, and the bottle pouch always had a water bottle in it, and didn’t fall out when my son threw the pack around. Sadly, we can’t use it for school because a standard piece of paper doesn’t fit. I assumed when I bought a 12” backpack, that the inside would hold something 12”. Not so! An 8.5x11 sheet of paper comes out with dog-eared corners at the top. It will be fine for toys and snack on road trips or park trips, but not suitable for school.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a tiny toddler
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo is very short (7th percentile, 2 yrs) and this is a perfect backpack for him. We pack it up with some toys and snacks to bring to his grandparents' house when he visits, and he's able to wear it all by himself and it doesn't overwhelm his small frame. It's just as adorable in person as it is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Kplandish

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids in preschool and kindergarten!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for one of my 3 year old twins who will be starting preschool in the fall. It is the perfect size for him. This backpack is durable and the quality is great. It has a very cute design. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: RaeB

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is awesome. The quality is great and the design is ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome. The quality is great and the design is so fun. It has all of the images that my son loves. I bought this backpack 3 weeks ahead of him starting preschool and I believe that it had a part in the very easy transition of going from daycare full-time to daycare part-time and a new beginning with preschool. When we drop him off at preschool in the morning, he is always so quick to jump out of his booster seat to put his super cool backpack on. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Elhami

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little guy
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read into the review/description enough. This is a very small backpack. His matching lunchbox is actually almost bigger than the backpack. Lol. It was okay for a little while. But eventually his homework folder was getting too bent and we had to get something different. But it’s cut for sleepovers at Nanas now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too small for practicality, even for kindergarten
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute backpack. My son loves trucks, so I got this for him for kindergarten. I didn't realize all of the random items kindergarteners are required to carry for school, so halfway through the school year, we upgraded to a much bigger backpack. The bigger one was too big for him considering his small size, but what can you do? They have to have everything but the kitchen sink for school now. This one couldn't fit his school work, pencils, a change of clothes, AND snow pants/shoes in it.
customer_reviews.author: bralphx

customer_reviews.title: For the price ($16), excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of the product, especially at this price: the fabric is thick, sturdy, but silky (looks like it cleans easily), the zippers look like they're good quality (we'll see after use). The mesh pocket is a practical, nice touch. The size is perfect for 4-7 years of age or even for bigger kids, for leisure. Will probably buy another color/pattern too.
customer_reviews.author: dmgbucharest

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a little smaller than I expected..I love the look being that my 3 year loves planes, trains and tracters. I had planned on using this bag for my 3 year olds pre-school needs like wipes, pull ups and the nap cot blanket and sheet, but as me tioned before, it was a bit too smal..I saw another backpack with this same print, it read on the description that it was larger, but I dont think I like the fact that it has a solid black patter undeneath versus the plan, train tracter print all over the bag..
customer_reviews.author: Primequeen

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my toddler for a school backpack. We’ve had it for 5 weeks and when I put 20 diapers inside It to transport to school the clasp on the strap snapped in half. You can’t just swap out the clasp because it’s sewn into the backpack. Not worth the money! For now we put duct tape on to try and hold It together, but It wont last long. Very disappointed because it’s a cute backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Sill

customer_reviews.title: This little backpack is absolutely perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This little backpack is absolutely perfect for toddlers. We use ours as a "diaper bag" now that my grandson is a little older and no longer needs as much stuff. We just keep a change of clothes, his sippy cup, a few diapers, wipes, and snacks. I bought him the matching lunchbox in case he needs to take his lunch along on his outings. He loves that he has a backpack like his brother's school bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice backpack. The color is great and the design is cute. However, it seems like a little bit too big for my 2-year old. I like their same-design lunchbox even better! My son would love to hold his lunchbox in his hands all the time from home to school.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Blurry picture depicts my busy two year old! But wanted to show the size of the backpack. Ordered this for our first family vacation as a carry on bag for our toddler. Couldn’t be more pleased! Small enough for him to carry but big enough to pack all his toys and snacks! And now that we are getting out of the “diaper bag” phase, this will be perfect for our regular outings. Can’t wait for the matching lunch box to be available, I will definitely be purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for a little man
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great! My little man (who is 2 1/2 but very small for his age) can wear this without difficulty. His folder for preschool fits in it; although, the corners are bent over on the very top. For us, that was a small inconvenience since he could actually manage and walk with this backpack independently. It is designed and fits in a way that does not cause him difficulty when walking, but I'm still able to pack his folder, a change of clothes, and diapers in it with room to spare. He loves the trucks and thinks he's a "big boy" doing it all by himself.
customer_reviews.author: MomMelly

customer_reviews.title: Terrific bag for average-size 2-yr-old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old who wanted a backpack like his big sister. This bag is not only adorable, but seems really sturdy. The front pocket (that's insulated) is really neat and handy for small snacks. Its pretty much perfect for him - the only thing that could make it better is if it had a snap in the front to keep it from sliding off his slim shoulders when the bag has "significant" weight to it (meaning more than usual stuffed animals and tiny cars 😉).
customer_reviews.author: esb1426

customer_reviews.title: Great daycare backpack
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for daycare. My son is two years old and had just started daycare. This backpack fit 8 pairs of clothes (pants,shirts, and socks) as well as eight pull ups. In addition we could fit sippy cups on the side pockets of the backpack. It could easily be carried by a toddler and is the perfect size if you are carrying only a few things in it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble finding a good sized backpack for my 3 year old. Most were either too big at 16” or too small at 10”. This is the perfect size! It fits him great and it can hold surprisingly a lot. Will definitely be buying one for my next one when he starts pre K.
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: Cute back pack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack but didn’t notice right it had a missed seam. I can attempt to sew it shut but not sure how it will hold up in the long run. I missed my return window unfortunately. We didn’t use the bag but when we got it out for our 4th of July cabin trip I noticed it. In general the back pack is super cute and seems heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie G.

customer_reviews.title: Much loved cute back pack
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this back pack! He was so excited to get it. He has been begging me for a lunchbox and a back pack like his older siblings. I liked this because of its printed design and it is insulated like a lunch box so we can take it on picnic. It is also great to put toys in when we are going somewhere. He does not mind carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffywumpkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: This back pack has been great for my Toddler. He takes it to the library and has been able to fit any and all his books in it. It even doubles as a diaper bag for his little brother too. We are pleased with this purchase and would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A great buy! Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my huge almost two year old to bring his stuff to daycare. Fits him on the smallest settings. Roomy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: that wonder woman

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun backpack. We've had it now for about 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun backpack. We've had it now for about 9 months and it has held up great. We use it as a big boy diaper bag for my toddler, so we take it everywhere we go. It's the perfect size for a little kid, has two good-size compartments, and two side pockets for drinks or small items. It's a sturdy backpack that adjusts to fit a little kid or a smaller adult. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Stack

customer_reviews.title: Love this for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack for my 3 year old toddler! Very reasonably priced. Very well made. Holds a lunch box and a light jacket. May be small for larger items, but it's a very appropriate size for a toddler to wear on his back! Also love the mesh cup holder in the side to keep his water bottle separate from the inside of the bag!
customer_reviews.author: DPatel

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son got this when he turned two and here we are a year and a half later and we still use it everyday. He likes to be independent so he will stick a few pull ups in there with a pack of wipes and carry it around when we’re out and about so if he ever needs a change we have all the stuff and he gets to feel like he’s helping out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tanner

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3-year old son and he used it for two full years. We got really good use out of it! nice size, great quality. It has 2 pockets which is really useful and a place for a water bottle on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Riki

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful toddler backpack! My 2 year old loves that he can be responsible and carry his own belongings. It's already lasted through mud puddles, nature walks, and constant play. No signs of fabric wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: RTLM

customer_reviews.title: Can fit many things inside
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for my toddler. Lightweight and comfortable. I use it for my son's clothes and the front pocket I put snacks. A lot of things fit inside even though it is small.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My son is 2 yrs, 4 months and loves wearing it. We bought it about 6 months ago and it was a little too big for the straps to stay on. But now, he can put it on himself. He even napped in it the other day.... ;) it actually holds a decent amount of stuff too
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality and fits a lot
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is excellent. Somehow it holds a ton of stuff even though it’s small enough for a little child. It so well made and impressed by the quality of the materials used. I was expecting a plastic / chemical smell like many kids backpacks have, but not in this one. It’s safe, adorable, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: NoraKnowsTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Has all the vehicles little boys love!
customer_reviews.text: Planes, dump trucks, everything a little boy would love! My son loves this backpack. It has held up to washing and is small enough for a two year old to carry around and big enough to pack a few changes of clothes, diapers, sip cups and snacks. We love this backpack, it’s incredibly cute
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little back pack for a pre-schooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little back pack for a pre-schooler. My son is an average size 3 year old and it fits him perfectly with room to grow. The front insulated pocket is a nice addition,even though I haven't utilized it to pack food yet. It is not large enough to put a standard notebook or folder into without bending the edges of the folder so if this is necessary you may want to purchase the next size up. The backpack is very sturdy and seams seem to be reinforced. It's very easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Malorey

customer_reviews.title: I contacted Wildkin and their customer service was excellent. They said they have a 1 year warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review 9 months after we purchased this back pack. My 2 year old, now 3 year old, son uses this back pack to take afew items to daycare every day. About 2 months ago the strap that you hang the pack up with started to rip. I contacted Wildkin and their customer service was excellent. They said they have a 1 year warranty and would replace my bag for free, no need to send the old one back. The replacement bag was on back order so they allowed me to choose any bag as a replacement. I had the bag less than 1 week from my original contact. Excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vermonter21

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this backpack. Perfect for the preschooler/kindergartener. He can't wait to wear it himself. We've been using it for a month and it's easy to clean and seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: JCT82

customer_reviews.title: Mesh broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fit for 2-5 year old. It's compact and a regular size folder won't fit unless you bend it. My son used this for less than a month and the side mesh that holds his water bottle already broke, he does not carry the backpack long since he uses a bus service. The mesh is thin/poor made compare to other backpack he had before. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little backpack
customer_reviews.text: We use this now instead of a diaper bag. Our son feels like a big boy to have his own little backpack. It is great to carry preschool items to and from home.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wencil

customer_reviews.title: Cute backpack, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Three important things for a little kid: they have to like it, it has to be a good fit, and it has to be durable. Check, check, and check. Decent price too. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack for my 3 yo in jump start. He loves his backpack and the size is perfect for his age. Will be buying again for my daughter when she is ready.
customer_reviews.author: Raychee

customer_reviews.title: Great little backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned three and I decided, since we're into potty training, that it was long past time to get rid of the diaper bag. I wanted something "boyish" that he could put his coloring book, crayons, cars, etc. in to take when we go 'bye bye." This is a great backpack for that. Fits what he thinks he needs to bring along (toys) and then some (juice box, snacks). Fabric and seams are thick and durable and the zippers are sturdy (so far). I picked this one because my son loves trains and tractors. It is smaller than a conventional backpack, but for a toddler it is a good size. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. I.

customer_reviews.title: and I love all the choices
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old to take to school. It is such a cute pattern, and I love all the choices. He's had it for months and it's still in perfect shape. It doesn't hold a folder without having to bend the folder a little, but it's perfect for a change of clothes, drink, etc. The lunch/snack compartment won't zip with the Tupperware lunch container he uses, but that's not a big deal. He loves his backpack and that's what matters. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: LindsMc1

customer_reviews.title: good for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: It's the right size for my toddler to take to daycare - holding his extra clothes and bringing home his art projects. The side pocket for a water bottle holds his Sigg kids bottle, but isn't big enough for anything much larger than that. It's nice that the front pocket is waterproof. This will work well for him to carry his toys and books when we travel, as well. The only negative I see is when my son drags the backpack on the ground outside, the fabric around the piping on the edges was very easily ripped. It's a cosmetic thing - the pack is still holding together nicely but the front bottom edge looks frayed after not much use.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this purchase. It is sturdy and seems well made, fits my pre-schooler just right, and I can pack in an icepack and lunchbox in the front compartment, as well as a change of clothes, water bottle and small toy in the main compartment. The front compartment is lined with some kind of waterproof material on the inside so while it gets wet from the condensation on the ice pack, it is easy to wipe clean. My son is into construction vehicles now and loves the design. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: WJL

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack for my 2 1/2 year old. We use it every day and plan on using it for school when he starts in August. We also have the matching napmat and his room will also be the same theme. I love the side drink pocket, it fits his insulated cup really well!
customer_reviews.author: Listh

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I love seeing my little grandson with this little back pack on. Holds up really well considering he 4 and plays hell with it.
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE WESTBERRY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddler
customer_reviews.text: So adorable, perfect size for my toddler. I have almost three year old who’s about to start school and the backpacks at target we’re just too big for him. This is the perfect size to fit his lunch, cup and a folder. Plus I just saw that they have a matching duffle bag!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Franz

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and great size for a toddler... a bit on the pricy side. I mean $30+ dollars I should be able to custom a name on it... otherwise it’s good
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to personalize
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bag I have gotten identical to this. They are extremely durable and I have other accessories to match. It was time to get a new one and I just got another identical one! It is easy to add your child’s name to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Mims

customer_reviews.title: Every bag's fabric pattern is different. Great for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: This small backpack is great for my tiny toddler. I love that the front pocket is thermal and can be easily wiped clean with a wet cloth. But beware: I had to buy a second one and return the first. The whole reason I bought it is because of the trains. When the first bag showed up, the pattern was such that there were NO trains anywhere on the bag. Luckily, the second bag had an engine front and center. Made my little guy very happy!
customer_reviews.author: JKG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Starter Bookbag!
customer_reviews.text: We ended up trading this bag back in, but we loved it! My other son had this same exact backpack and it worked perfectly for him. It is the perfect size for a 2 to 4 year old. You can fit a water bottle on the side and the essentials within the two pockets. I love the design with the trains, trucks, tractors, and planes! So much fun for a little machine lover. We would have kept this one, but we decided to get a bigger one instead!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Gess

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and durable. Fits perfectly on little ones (toddler), yet still large enough to hold a lunch box and drink on the inside pouches. I clean the inside with wet wipes, but it's gone through a wash cycle with no issues after a big spill.
customer_reviews.author: Mhendi

customer_reviews.title: He is so proud and happy to wear it when he comes over
customer_reviews.text: got this for my 2 year old grandson's birthday. He is so proud and happy to wear it when he comes over, or goes visiting with mommy. He takes a couple of books, a snack, and extra clothes. It is adorable and seems surprisingly well made.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe R

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted for a year and still looks good
customer_reviews.text: I have this bookbag for my 2 year old to take to preschool. It fits him perfectly and after having it for a year it still looks so good and has held up great. I've thrown it in the washing machine and air dried it multiple time. No complaints from me!
customer_reviews.author: MWill

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday backpack for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great for everyday use if you have little ones in daycare. Large enough to fit daily items without be bulky.
customer_reviews.author: awri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for little hands😊
customer_reviews.text: Cute little back perfect for preschoolers. Easily fits lunchbox, a water bottle and spare clothes for few hours of preschool or any other activity. Plus they have different designs to choose from👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail along with the lunch box and it’s so adorable. My 22 month old loves it! We are going on a 28 hr trip this weekend so we will see if it holds up well! Seems like a good backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Zelliedaily

customer_reviews.title: Good for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has been perfect for son when he was 2 and 3. It doesn't slide off his shoulders and holds the lunchbox that matches perfectly. Not much room for anything else with the lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: Krip

customer_reviews.title: Too small for preschool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son preschool bag. The bag is too small for a folder. I can force it in and it’ll bend a bit on the corners. I had to return it and bought the 15 in version. But the made and quality is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: goobie

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it’ll fit your 3ft tall toddler
customer_reviews.text: My 2-1/2 year old son loves this back pack. About 5 other kids at his daycare have it too so he’s one of the cool kids I’m sure. It’s the perfect size for a little 3 foot person. He feels so cool wearing it. So glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: N or S Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality kids backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this backpack! It's good quality and they have a lot of different patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Day

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small 2 year old to take to preschool. Holds 5-6 cloth diapers, large planet wise wet bag, blanket, change of clothes, snack pouch, and his munchkin 360 sippy cup in the mesh pocket on the outside. My son weighs 25 pounds and is 35" tall and he can carry this on his back full.
customer_reviews.author: DenaliBear

customer_reviews.title: Great  backpack/diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag for preschoolers. It has lasted the whole school year. It has enough room for diapers, wipes, an outfit, A few snacks and a little pocket on the side for a drink! You can even fit Mom’s wallet and use it as a diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old Grandson loves his backpack. Able to carrier his own things to daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for a 2 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Great size. We use it for daycare, and it fits my sons nap blanket and spare outfits for the week. The side drink pocket is very helpful as well. Its the perfect size for our little 2 year old in daycare! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gina St.Jean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2 - 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My foster son carries this everyday to pre-school. It's the perfect size for a 2 year old! It's very durable and so easy to clean. The colors are bright and I Monogrammed his name on front pocket. Great backpack for travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Looks very durable.
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves this backpack. It looks sturdy, has a great pattern, light in weight, and more importantly it has an outside cup holder for his water/juice.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsy_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Super cool Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to donate and it was such a well made and adorable bag that I couldn't believe it. I'm so happy to make this purchase. If you have a child who is into locomotives, definitely get this bag. It has sufficient divisions and pockets to store their things.
customer_reviews.author: SBM

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler backpack
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our toddler to use as an activity bag for travel. It’s well made and perfect size for a little guy to tote around
customer_reviews.author: Cara Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack for Todder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old who started preschool this year. He wanted a backpack like his big sister. This is a good quality and very cute. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this backpack! I got it for him to start preschool and he loves that it’s “his size” and nobody else has it! All the other kids have big kid backpacks that almost drag on the ground from target, lots of repeats
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Wright

customer_reviews.title: Our son loves this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Our 19-month old son takes this pack with him to preschool every day. He loves the trains and planes. The construction is study and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 3 year-old! He’s been using for a few months and it’s super durable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack fits perfect for my 2 year old for over night stay.
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Trains, Planes, & Trucks 12" backpack for our 4 year old Grandson who owns about 100 matchbox cars & has to take them everywhere with him. This is very well made & works perfect to tote his cars wherever he goes.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well-made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 month old to go to hourly day care. It mainly contains diapers, wipes, a change of clothes and shoes, snacks and a couple of toys. He loves wearing it and it's just the right size for a toddler. It's well-made and the design is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate insulation
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item after purchase because I didn't the insulation on the lunch pouch was adequate. I ended up going with a similar bag by Obersee, which seems much thicker and sturdier. I usually pack a Blue Ice with my son's milk or juice, and I was concerned about condensation sweating through to the bag's contents.
customer_reviews.author: DrkEyedCajn

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this backpack, and occasionally I can get him to carry it. He is two and its a good size fro him. We transitioned from his diaper bag to this bag and this bag can hold everything he needs plus more.
customer_reviews.author: Tojo

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and well made!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice backpack. I bought it for my one-year-old grandson. He needed a backpack for daycare. This backpack is a perfect size. Great colors, and design. It has a little compartment for snacks. Just really cute and well made! Price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: Although I did think this product was pricey - my son loves it! Takes it to daycare everyday. He loves all the different cars and trucks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Zareena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 yr old
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for my 3 year old. It's just the right size and holds everything he needs to carry right now. It is a little too small for a regular sized folder so when he starts school we may need to get him a new one, but to carry around his toys and a change of clothes it's perfect. Love the drink holder on the side also.
customer_reviews.author: jlash

customer_reviews.title: Great, but small
customer_reviews.text: Great, but small. Fits a few small board books, a travel-sized magna doodle, and a teddy bear, but that was about it. Also, I think I was mistaken that my toddler would wear it... nope! He loves it, but wouldn't wear it at all, so I carried it along with my own bags through the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it! We used it for his toys and ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this in place of a diaper bag for my 2 year old. Love it! We used it for his toys and quick diapering needs on a recent plane ride and it worked great! He loved wearing it himself and kept pointing out "airplane/ tractor/ auto...etc)
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: My son loves pointing out the planes and trucks on the design pattern.
customer_reviews.text: I love that there’s a reflective strip lining the smaller pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as pictured. Great bag for me 18 month old. I don’t really let him carry it around Bc with items in it, it’s a little heavy but when we first took it out of package he liked to carry it around. It’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and durable. Holds the size of an ipad perfectly as well as toys and clothes. Straps have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Calsepher1

customer_reviews.title: Great for daycare
customer_reviews.text: We use this bag for daycare. We put a change of clothes at the bottom then diapers and wipes in the rest. His sippy cup goes in the front and it all fits really well. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Cute Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute backpack and my grandson loves it. It's a good size for a preschooler and seems to be well-made and holding up well but then, school just started. I'll know more about it's durability in the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Easter to take on outings and to daycare. He loves it, we love it. It is just the right size to put everything he needs in it, the design is beautiful. It is very durable and well made. It is easy to clean, as well. I highly recommend this backpack and I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte F.

customer_reviews.title: Great pattern
customer_reviews.text: Too cute! Fits my 21 month old comfortably. He has some books that are folder sized, but you just curl the corners and shove them in the back of the big pouch and they fit fine. I think this will work great for his first airplane ride.
customer_reviews.author: The4Trouts

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my 3 yr old (not too big) and great quality. Nice inner compartments in small pocket. Has an area in big part to insert a name card. If I want to buy another for my LO, I will def go with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my Preschooler
customer_reviews.text: I was hesistant on choosing this size or the standard size for my son. He just turned 3 and started Preschool. It’s perfect for him to carry his folder that goes back and forth from school to home. The folder is plastic so it bends at the top but that works for us since it almost never leaves his backpack. This backpack is adorable and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little backpack with an insulated pouch
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this backpack, particularly the front insulated pocket that I was not expecting! Very well constructed and perfectly petite in size for a 2-year-old. Great to hold a few diapers and a travel wipes pack along with some small toys and a drink and snacks in the front if not a full lunch. It's been holding up to light wear and it's easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Backpack for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is adorable and really well made. It is the perfect size for my three-year-old granddaughter. It is difficult to find backpacks that aren’t walking ads for toys. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a toddler. I wanted to reclaim the diaper bag for the new baby a few months ago, so I bought this for my 2 year old. He loves it and wants to carry it everywhere. Good size for a few pull ups, wipes, change of clothes and snacks. He packs a couple small toys for himself too. It doesn't stay on his back very well, but he carries it with the little handle. Good quality cloth and the zippers seem sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: HJC

customer_reviews.title: High quality backpack that's the perfect size for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: High quality backpack that's the perfect size for my 2 year old. It's small enough to fit him, but large enough that I can still fit lunch, diapers and wipes, change of clothes, and a water bottle in it.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

product_meta.title: Wildkin Backpack for Toddlers, Boys and Girls Ideal for Daycare, Preschool and Kindergarten, Perfect Size for School and Travel, Mom's Choice Award Winner, One, Trains, Planes, and Trucks
product_meta.description: Color:Trains, Planes, and TrucksYour little one will be the talk of the playground with the Wildkin 12 Inch Backpack! Measuring 12.5 x 10.5 x 7.5 inches, the 12 Inch Backpack has a just-right size that’s perfect for packing all the essentials, plus some after school snacks! With backpacks, it’s all about the features, and Wildkin’s 12 Inch Backpack is full of features that put the “fun” in “functionality”. Two padded, adjustable shoulder straps provide a comfortable wear, while the durable top handle is perfect for hanging in a cubby before heading out to recess. Its two zippered compartments and side mesh water bottle pocket make staying organized a breeze! Leave the lunchbox at home the 12 Inch Backpack’s front zippered compartment is insulated, easy-to-clean, and food-safe perfect for storing lunches and snacks. Additionally, the exterior of the front zippered pocket features reflective tape to help keep your little one safe and seen when it’s dark outside. As always, all of Wildkin’s 12 Inch Backpacks feature vibrant, playful patterns, so your child will love this fun new addition to their school and travel gear. Can’t get enough of Wildkin’s awesome patterns? Each 12 Inch Backpack was designed to coordinate with other Wildkin gear, so go ahead and make a theme out of it! From nap mats to lunch bags, your child will love having their favorite designs with them on-the-go. Spot clean only. When necessary, use mild soap and damp washcloth to clean lunch bag interior. Do not store or close lunch bag unless dry. 90-day manufacturer's warranty against defects normal wear-and-tear and misuse excluded. Rigorously tested to ensure that all parts are lead-safe, bpa-free, phthalate-free, and conform to all rules and regulations set forth by the Consumer Products Safety Commission.
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT SIZE – Fill it up! The 12 Inch Backpack’s just-right size means you can bring the school supplies and snacks. Measuring 12.5 x 10.5 x 7.5 inches, with two zippered compartments this backpack is perfect for preschool, daycare, and day trips.

IT’S ALL ABOUT THE FEATURES – Wildkin’s 12 Inch Backpack has features galore from heavy-duty zipper, straps, and buckles to reflective piping at the front pocket. Food-safe front compartment, side mesh pocket for easy access to drinks and water bottles.

MOM’S CHOICE AWARDEE - Wildkin is a recipient of the prestigious Mom’s Choice Award. The MCA evaluates products created for parents. Around the world, parents, educators, & retailers trust MCA Excellence seal when selecting quality products for children.

BACKPACK AND LUNCH BOX IN ONE – Bring on the snacks! With Wildkin’s 12 Inch Backpack you don’t have to worry about weighing your little one down with a bulky lunch box. Keep snacks or lunch in the insulated front pocket, measuring 9 x 8.5 x 2 inches.

PLAYGROUND APPROVED – Your little one will be the talk of the playground with Wildkin 12 Inch Backpack! Eye-catching patterns and functional design, Two padded, adjustable shoulder straps, while the durable top handle is perfect for hanging in a cubby.

VERSATILE DESIGN – Like many other Wildkin products, the 12 Inch Backpack was designed to be multifunctional, which is why many of our customers opt to use it as a diaper bag! Its just-right size is perfect for packing diapers, wipes, a change of clothes.

TRAVEL IN STYLE – At Wildkin, we know that details matter to you and your child, we made sure that our 12 Inch Backpack was designed with that in mind. Featuring vibrant patterns, your child will love this fun new addition to their school and travel gear.

PATTERN COORDINATES WITH OTHER WILDKIN AND OLIVE KIDS ITEMS – Make a theme out of it! Each 12 Inch Backpack was designed to coordinate with other Wildkin items. From nap mats to lunch bags, your child will love having their favorite designs with them.
